title: Laverne Cox on "Disclosure" and Changing Public Perceptions of the Trans Community
itunes:title: Laverne Cox on "Disclosure" and Changing Public Perceptions of the Trans Community
description:
From June 2020, Laverne Cox discusses "Disclosure," her documentary about Hollywood's portrayals of trans people, and argues for professionally elevating members of marginalized communities.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
